directions: In a medium bowl, stir together the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, soy sauce, garlic and basil. Add cheese and tomatoes; tossing to coat. Cover and chill for 30 minutes to marinate.
Place salad greens onto serving plates. Top with the cheese and tomato mixture. Season with black pepper.
ingredients: 8 ounces smoked Gouda cheese, cut into 1/2 inch cubes
title: Mixed Greens with Smoked Gouda
